lines.text: Periodic changes in amplitude produced by two waves of different frequencies

secText:
Enduring Understandings:
1. A single frequency sound can be described as a [OBJ:expsec_n288:pure tone]. [OBJ:expsec_n289:Pitch] refers to the frequency of the sound. [OBJ:expsec_n290:Timbre] refers to the complexity of the sound.
2. [OBJ:expsec_n291:Fourier analysis] uses harmonics to graphically represent sounds. [OBJ:expsec_n292:MIDI] uses digital representation to represent sounds.
3. [OBJ:expsec_n293:Beats] are a pattern of loud and soft sounds.
